title.rendered: Ilyssa Riley: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Ilyssa Riley
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
    • Horses
  • Ilyssa Riley’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Husband
    • How Old is Ilyssa Riley?
    • What is her nationality?
    • FAQs About Ilyssa Riley

Ilyssa Riley is a professional barrel racer and rodeo contestant who has made a name for herself in the rodeo world. Born on July 29, 1997, in Hico, Texas, Riley has been competing in rodeos since 2018, earning a spot in the 2023 National Finals Rodeo.

Here you can follow Ilyssa Riley’s net worth, career earnings, career highlights, personal details, husband, and more.

About Ilyssa Riley

Ilyssa Riley was born and raised in Hico, Texas, and grew up with a passion for rodeo. She attended West Texas A&M University, where she pursued a degree in advertising and public relations.

Early Career

During her time at university, she qualified for the College National Finals Rodeo in 2017, the same year she joined the Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA).

Professional Career

Riley’s professional career has seen a steady rise. In 2020, she finished 98th in the world standings, improved to 55th in 2021, and by 2022, she was within the top 50 at 30th.

Her significant career breakthrough came in 2022 when she won the Texas Circuit Finals average title, qualifying her for her first National Finals Rodeo (NFR).

In 2023, Riley had a successful season, winning several rodeos, including the Texas Circuit Finals Rodeo, the Los Fresnos (TX) PRCA Rodeo, the Toppenish (WA) Rodeo, the Westcliff (CO) Stampede Rodeo, the Sanders County Fair & PRCA Rodeo (Plains, MT), and the Northwest Montana Fair and Rodeo (Kalispell, MT).

She also finished second at the Comal County Fair & Rodeo (New Braunfels, TX). These victories contributed to her earnings of $111,473 in 2023, and she secured the 10th position in the WPRA World Standings.

In 2023, Riley qualified for her first NFR, a significant achievement in her career. 

Horses

Riley rides several horses in her competitions, including Themjorthriller “Thriller”, a 13-year-old sorrel gelding, and Mistys Money Blurr “Money”, a 7-year-old gelding. She also has a 12-year-old sorrel gelding named Championofthehouse “Champ”.

Ilyssa Riley’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Ilyssa Riley’s net worth is estimated to be $1 million.

Her career earnings through the 2023 regular season amount to $111,473. This figure does not include any additional income from endorsements or other sources.

Career Earnings

Ilyssa Riley, a professional rodeo contestant, has had a successful career with significant earnings. As of 2023, her career earnings amounted to $197,185.

In the same year, she earned $111,473, which contributed to her securing the 10th position in the Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA) World Standings.

Her earnings have seen a steady increase over the years. For instance, in August 2023, her earnings were reported to be $104,601, which increased to $111,473 by the end of the year.

Personal Details

Husband

Ilyssa Riley is married, as mentioned in her athlete profile on the Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo website. However, her husband’s name is undisclosed.

How Old is Ilyssa Riley?

Riley is 41 years old as of November 2023.

What is her nationality?

She is an American.

FAQs About Ilyssa Riley

What is Ilyssa Riley’s Net Worth?

Her estimated net worth is $1 million as of 2023.

When did she join the WPRA?

She joined the Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA) in 2018.

Has she qualified for the National Finals Rodeo?

Yes, Ilyssa qualified for her first Wrangler National Finals Rodeo in 2023, securing the No. 10 position in the WPRA World Standings.
